Reason: The 'includeAndroidLdpiTvdpi' configuration option does not directly involve any performance-related operations that are time-expensive or memory-expensive within its related code. It simply determines whether to include ldpi and tvdpi density descriptors in the list of AndroidDensityDescriptors based on a boolean value. This configuration does not lead to notable performance variations at the system level, as it only affects the size of the list without causing significant performance impacts.
